caption.center: THE STATE OF WASHINGTON, Respondent, v. DOUGLAS CHARLES GLASFORD, Appellant.

court.center: The Court of Appeals of Washington, Division Two.

posture.unpublished: [EDITOR'S NOTE: This case is unpublished as indicated by the issuing court.] Appeal from a judgment of the Superior Court for Clark County, No. 94-1-00866-8, Roger A. Bennett, J., entered October 4, 1994.

opinion_text.unpublished: Affirmed by unpublished opinion per Houghton, A.C.J., concurred in by Morgan and Turner, JJ.
